sentences.en: A central force is a radial force which depends only on the distance from the origin.
sentences.cn: 有心力是一种径向力,它的大小只取于离原点的距离.

sentences.cn: 轴承套圈和垫圈的圆柱形表面,用以在径向引导保持架.

sentences.en: How many radial ( axial ) clearance are there in this bush ( journal bearing, thrust bearing )?
sentences.cn: 这个轴套 ( 轴颈轴承 、 止推轴承 ) 的径向 ( 轴向 ) 间隙是 多少 ?

sentences.en: It filled a gap in large - scale radial drilling machine.
sentences.cn: 它填补了国内大型摇臂钻床空白.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the effects of rehabilitation on radial nerve injury.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨康复治疗对桡神经损伤的治疗作用及预后.

sentences.cn: 锥管螺纹在内螺纹内会产生径向应力.

sentences.en: The radial displacement must be accompanied by a circumferential force.
sentences.cn: 径向位移必须伴有圆周力.

sentences.en: The radial displacement must be accompanied by a hoop force.
sentences.cn: 径向位移必定伴随着圆环力.

sentences.en: The radial nerve supplies the triceps ( and arconeus ) with fibers derived primarily from C 6, 7 and C 8.
sentences.cn: 桡神经主要接收C6 、 C7和C8纤维,供应肱三头股 ( 和特后肌 ).

sentences.cn: 球体表面点的总位移是纯径向的.

sentences.en: The white marble floors were inlaid in a radial pattern of brass.

sentences.cn: 同时子午线轮胎本身具有的特点使轮胎无内胎成为可能.
